overview: Lumina Vitamin C Elixir is a competing product that offers a higher concentration of Vitamin C and additional key ingredients, but at a higher price point.

comparisons.comparison_note: Lumina Vitamin C Elixir is 29% more expensive than GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
Lumina Vitamin C Elixir has a 50% higher concentration of Vitamin C than GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
Lumina Vitamin C Elixir has an additional key ingredient, Niacinamide, which is not found in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum

comparisons.product_b_value: Brightening, Fades dark spots, Improves skin elasticity
comparisons.comparison_note: Lumina Vitamin C Elixir has an additional benefit, improving skin elasticity, which is not claimed by GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
Lumina Vitamin C Elixir is suitable for an additional skin type, dry skin, which is not claimed by GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
